Sandy Powell, as you’ll see,
as our costume designer,

made this decision to
hand-paint all the costumes,

to more specifically
integrate the clothes
into the 2D world.

So for instance, if you look
at Emily Blunt’s dress, which

is all tiered,
there’s no tier.

It’s one flat
piece of material

that, literally, is painted
on, like there are tiers —

same with the tie — 
same with the buttons.

It’s all in an effort to
make it feel like they’re
part of the 2D world.
